scripts.start: yarn run build && concurrently --raw 'yarn run watch-css' 'yarn run watch-js' 'yarn run serve'
scripts.test: yarn run lint-nginx && yarn run lint-scss
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-site
scripts.build-css: sass src/sass/styles.scss src/css/styles.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed && postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --replace 'src/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build-js: yarn run copy-cookie-policy && yarn run copy-global-nav
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
